attributes.action: Change the Category for Motor tricycles, three wheeled vehicles from the current category B1 to be inculded on the currect motorcycle catrgory A licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as current standing you can have a trike but only if you pass your car test as it currently a category B1.
the experance and the power of driving a car is compleatly diffrent to riding a trike
when learning how to drive a car gives the learner no knowledge of riding a motor-tricycle  and with the current driving schools the is no way to learning how to ride a trike untill passing car licence 

as it stands alot of the tricycle owners have converted to riding a trike from a motorcycle most common reason is due to accdent on a motorcycle or illness as that said alot of motorcycle owners do not have a car licence but if they do have accdent and do not have the power to ride a motorcycle any more, they than have to take another test to be able to get back on the road
